TO THANH THUONG
Senior ReactJS Developer
Phone: 0986335807
Email: thuongthanhto@gmail.com
Skype: live:thuongthanhto
Birthday: 29/05/1995
SUMMARY
I have more than 2 years of experience in ReactJS, and work on many technologies. I 
always aspire to discover new knowledge. I can adapt quickly to new technology. I am 
happy to work in a close team environment. I always apply a positive attitude to every task I 
undertake.
I have knowledge about Frontend, Backend and DevOps
I have the ability to research new technologies quickly and apply them to projects.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Programming Technology: 
•
Frontend: React, Redux, GraphQL, HTML, CSS, ES6, Flow
•
Backend: Nodejs (Loopback and Express), Google Cloud Functions, GraphQL
•
Database: NoSQL (MongoDB, Firebase), SQL (MS SQL, MySQL)
•
DevOps: Azure Clouds, Google Cloud Functions, Heroku.
•
Other skill: Unit Test, Automation Test.
Programming Tools: Git, Visual Code, SVN, Trello, Jira, Slack, Skype.
Platforms: Ubuntu and Window.
EDUCATION, PROFESSIONAL CERTIFICATION AND WORKING
Study at University Information Technology (UIT) HCMC (2013 – 2017).
Certification GST rank A of FPT Software HCMC.
2 / 4
Certification Fresher of FPT Software HCMC
ReactJS Developer at FPT Software from 5-2016 to 5-2018 (Job rank: Level 3/5)
Currently, I am working at Golden Owl Company with role is ReactJS Developer

It is a website help manage Interview candiates and simplify the interview process.
Industry Domain: Interview process management.
Responsibilities: 
    Coding new feature, maintain, write Unit Test and Automation Test .
Team size: 3 members 
Technologies used: ReactJS, Redux, Apollo GraphQL, Google Cloud Funcions

Booking hotel and review trip travel

ReactJS Developer
Project: Surroundview
Project Description: 
HRDigital's surround-view is a mobile application and web platform that enables consistent 
anonymous feedback exchange and HR analytics. It supports employees in their personal 
and professional development, thus maximizing their contribution to organizational change 
and corporate success. Surround-view utilizes state-of-the-art security technology and a 
cloud-based architecture.
Industry Domain: Web working with feedback
Responsibilities: 
- Coding (Front-end)
- Maintenance & Bug fixing. 
Team size: 5 members 
Technologies used: .NET WebAPI, ReactJS, Redux
